name: nowrap
school_tradition: Continental philosophy, Existentialism, Marxism, Hermeneutics, Anarchism
influenced: Raymond Aron, Georges Bataille, Alain Badiou, Frithjof Bergmann, Albert Camus, Simone de Beauvoir
notable_ideas: Bad faith, "existence precedes essence," nothingness, “every consciousness is a non-positional consciousness of itself," Sartrean terminology
